name: PowerPlatformDownloadPaportal
description: Power Platform Download PowerPages web site (PAPortal)
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment url this task targets; default is the pipeline variable that e.g. the CreateEnvironment task has set before.

inputs.name: DownloadPath
inputs.label: Download path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local path to where the Power Pages website content will be downloaded

inputs.name: WebsiteId
inputs.label: Id of website
inputs.helpMarkDown: Website id of the Power Pages website to be downloaded

inputs.name: Overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overwrite if Power Pages website exists at the given path

inputs.name: ExcludeEntities
inputs.label: Entities to exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of entity logical names to exclude while downloading

inputs.name: ModelVersion
inputs.label: Version for model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the model to download. If not specified, the latest version will be downloaded.
